title: New: Oceaán – Neéd U
body:
Since emerging last year with his debut track Haze, 20 year old **Oceaán** from Manchester has stayed relatively below the radar.

With the release of his latest track, the deeply soulful Neéd U, his r&b infused sounds are beginning to spread to a wider audience. Choppy beats and the stunning, versatile vocal merge flawlessly, forming what is one of the years finest tracks. It’s early days, but **Oceaán** is perhaps the most exciting young British producer to have emerged since a certain Jai Paul. Check out _Neéd U_ below.
